Interface ec.time.TimerCallback

public interface interface TimerCallback
This is the interface for items returned by Timer callback-setters. The only thing that one may do with them is to cancel them.

cancel()
Cancel the given callback.

cancel 
 public abstract void cancel()
Cancel the given callback.
